metadata.title: CVE-2022-41723 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A maliciously crafted HTTP/2 stream could cause excessive CPU consumptionin the HPACK decoder, sufficient to cause a denial of service from a smallnumber of small requests.

criterions.comment: google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
containerd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
